name: Sagar Bhavsar
headline: Data Scientist | AI/ML (RAG, LLMs) | MS in Information Systems @ NYU | Python, SQL, AWS, GCP
summary: Data scientist and AI engineer with 3 years of experience building intelligent systems that bridge business and technology. Master's graduate from NYU Stern and Courant with a background in Computer Science and Information Systems. Focus on data science, AI, RAG systems, LLMs, and full-stack real-time analytics. Currently at Julius analyzing large-scale labor market datasets and designing clustering workflows on 2M+ datapoints.
visaStatus: F-1 OPT - can work in the US for up to 3 years without sponsorship (until July 2028); after that, would need H-1B sponsorship

projects.name: Cadillac Website Enhancement
